tldr: Affected versions of the package are vulnerable to a path traversal vulnerability, allowing an attacker to overwrite any files on the filesystem through a malformed `SOPInstanceUID` value in a C-STORE request.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you use the handle_store function directly, or if you indirectly use the Store SCP functionality via pynetidcom's apps (https://github.com/pydicom/pynetdicom/blob/main/pynetdicom/apps/) or otherwise.
